messages.message: Navigate elevators to floors with passengers and then to the floors they want to go (yellow frames) And try to do it really fast! Click or press any key to exit
Transported: 0/$0 Best time: unknown Worst time: unknown Average time: unknown
Transported: $0/$1 Best time: $2 sec Worst time: $3 sec Average time: $4 sec
PAUSE. PRESS SPACE. ESC TO EXIT
PRESS F2 TO RESTART, ESC TO EXIT
